legislators. currently, about 480 lobbyists file individual reports every three months. the lieutenant governor's office is responsible for overseeing financial disclosure reports and it relies on whistle-blowers to make sure the lobbyists are being honest. the public is a great tool. so is the media in a lot of cases. if they see something that they're aware doesn't match what is on the report, they can always contact us, said Spencer Hadley , deputy office administrator. you can send a story to multiple email addresses by separating the email addresses with a semicolon(;)
